title: Textile, ca. 1963
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: plain weave foundation, screen printed.
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 398 x 93 cm (13 ft. 11/16 in. x 36 5/8 in.)

description: Bands of solid color alternate with dots arranged in dots and diagonals. Black, orange, red, blue and white.
